critical_first_action.purpose: Returns complete tool schema - single source of truth for all available tools

execution_pattern.telemetry_rule: IN AUTONOMOUS MODE: ALL TOOL CALLS ROUTE THROUGH EXECUTION HUB
execution_pattern.why: Hub captures token usage, success rates, execution times - lost data = system can't self-improve

authentication.critical: Claude Code uses SUBSCRIPTION AUTH (not API key)
authentication.never: Never add API keys to Claude Code config

differentiators: Not AI chat - Execution infrastructure with dual-agent coordination
Not SaaS - Local-first, zero cloud costs
Not automation - Autonomous execution with learning

allowed: Build New Tools Mid-Execution - If you do something 2-3x manually, build the abstraction
Optimize Existing Tools - Refactor for speed, add batch ops, fix bugs
System Improvements - Helper functions, utilities, abstractions
autonomous_permissions.only_rule: Log what you changed in execution logs
autonomous_permissions.philosophy: Every execution should make the next one faster. Build infrastructure that makes you more powerful.
